Get report
```{r}
mt_data=parse_matrix(char_matrix, coding_states_report)
```

    
# Report    


## N of chrs with inapplicable states
```{r}
mt_data$contains_inapplicable %>% length
```

## N of chrs with missing states
```{r}
    
    mt_data$contains_missing %>% length
```

## Chrs with polymorphic states
```{r}

    mt_data$contains_polymorph
```

## Chrs with unused states
```{r}

    mt_data$unused_chr_states
```

## Groups of characters with the same sequnce pattern
```{r}

    mt_data$same_chrs_patterns
```

## Number of missing states "?" per taxon
```{r}

    cbind(names(mt_data$taxa_missing_states), unname(mt_data$taxa_missing_states))
```
